title: Textile, ca. 1920
medium:
Medium: wool, cotton
Technique: Woven imitation of wool needlepoint. Square repeat of a rectangular pattern unit reversed in alternate rows.
description: Fragment of upholstery fabric with a design of elaborate vertical, dovetailed and scrolling vines with leaves and fruit in deep green, dark red and ochre superimposed on a blue-green leaf pattern on a black background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1920.Medium: wool, cotton
Technique: Woven imitation of wool needlepoint. Square repeat of a rectangular pattern unit reversed in alternate rows.. 1971-56-6.
